conversation.text: Based on the user's preferences and the list of movies provided, I recommend the movie 'Where We Belong' (2012). The plot revolves around a downtown street hustler named Drone who leads a disobedient group of young men engaging in juvenile delinquency and violence that was left behind by their guardian Chief. As time passes, he decides to drop the drug business aside for good and focus living a positive life as boxer. In the path of success to his dream as an International Boxing Champion, things worsen when his former boss Face blackmails him by abducting ghetto brother Buggie with interest of using him transport drugs outside the country. He beats odds offering his African Title Match prize to liberate the brother and later transformed his ghetto family.
